config.serveraddrs_doc: This is a comma delimited list of hostnames that the server should listen on. It might be useful to make an internal-only server on a gateway machine for example...
config.w3routeaddr_doc: W3 Play Game router address. Just put your server address in here or use 0.0.0.0:6200 for server to bind to all interfaces, but make sure you set up w3trans if you do.
